metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Django is a back-end server side web framework.
content.html: Django is a back-end server side web framework.

content.text: Django is free, open source and written in Python.
content.html: Django is free, open source and written in Python.

content.text: Django makes it easier to build web pages using Python.
content.html: Django makes it easier to build web pages using Python.

content.text: In this tutorial you get a step by step guide on how to install and create a Django project. You will learn how to create a project where you can add, read, update or delete data.
content.html: In this tutorial you get a step by step guide on how to install and create a Django project. You will learn how to create a project where you can add, read, update or delete data.

content.text: You will learn how to make HTML Templates and use Django Template Tags to insert data within a HTML document.
content.html: You will learn how to make HTML Templates and use Django Template Tags to insert data within a HTML document.

content.text: You will learn how to work with QuerySets to extract, filter, and sort data from the database.
content.html: You will learn how to work with QuerySets to extract, filter, and sort data from the database.

content.text: You will also learn how to set up a PostgreSQL database and how to deploy your Django project to the world.
content.html: You will also learn how to set up a PostgreSQL database and how to deploy your Django project to the world.

content.text: In the tutorial we will use examples to better explain the various concepts.
content.html: In the tutorial we will use examples to better explain the various concepts.

content.code_html:
<ul>
  {% for x in mymembers %}
    <li>{{ x.firstname }}</li>
  {% endfor %}
</ul>

content.text: Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.
content.html: Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
What is a correct syntax for running a Django project?
content.html: What is a correct syntax for running a Django project?
See all Django Exercises

content.text: Learn by taking a quiz! The quiz will give you a signal of how much you know about Django.
content.html: Learn by taking a quiz! The quiz will give you a signal of how much you know about Django.

content.text: Create a free W3Schools account and get access to more features and learning materials:

links.title: Sign up to try My Learning

content.html: Sign Up for Free

content.text: Note: This is an optional feature. You can study at W3Schools without creating an account.
content.html: Note: This is an optional feature. You can study at W3Schools without creating an account.

content.text: You will also find references over the most common Django features:
content.html: You will also find references over the most common Django features:
